00018 // Wrapper for gaussian plus argus pdf.

00034 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00035 BdkPdfGaussArgus::BdkPdfGaussArgus() : _fracGauss(0) {
00036   // Default Constructor:
00037   addComponents();
00038 }
00039 
00040 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00041 BdkPdfGaussArgus::BdkPdfGaussArgus(const char * theName,
00042                                    const char * theDesc,
00043                                    RooRealVar & dependent)  : _fracGauss(0) {
00044   // Initializing Constructor:
00045   addComponents();
00046   init(theName, theDesc, dependent);
00047 }
00048 
00049 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00050 BdkPdfGaussArgus::~BdkPdfGaussArgus() {
00051   // Destructor:
00052   deleteFrac();
00053 }
00054 
00055 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00056 BdkPdfGaussArgus::BdkPdfGaussArgus(const BdkPdfGaussArgus & pdf) {
00057 // Dummy copy constructor:
00058     cout << "BdkPdfGaussArgus::BdkPdfGaussArgus -- dummy copy constructor"
00059          << endl;
00060 }

00062 
00063 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00064 void BdkPdfGaussArgus::init(const char * theName,
00065                             const char * theDesc,
00066                             RooRealVar & dependent) {
00067   // Initializer:
00068   _fracGauss = 0;
00069 
00070   SetName(theName);
00071   SetTitle(theDesc);
00072 
00073   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00074   setDependent(dependent);
00075   initParameters();
00076 }
00077 
00078 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00079 void BdkPdfGaussArgus::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00080   // Sets the dependent variable:
00081   _dependent = &dependent;
00082   _gauss.setDependent(dependent);
00083   _argus.setDependent(dependent);
00084 
00085   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00086 }
00087 
00088 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00089 void BdkPdfGaussArgus::initParameters() {
00090   // Initializes the contained RRV's and PDF wrappers:
00091   _fracGauss = new RooRealVar(GetName() + TString(".fracGauss"),
00092                               GetTitle () + TString(" fracGauss"),
00093                               0.8, 0, 1);
00094 
00095   _fracGauss->setError(0.02);
00096 
00097   _gauss.init(GetName() + TString(".gauss"), 
00098               GetTitle() + TString(" Gauss"), 
00099               *_dependent);
00100 
00101   _argus.init(GetName() + TString(".argus"), 
00102               GetTitle() + TString(" Argus"), 
00103               *_dependent);
00104 }
00105 
00106 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00107 void BdkPdfGaussArgus::createPdf() {
00108   // Builds the PDF. The PDFs of the contained wrappers are automatically built
00109   _thePdf = new RooAddPdf(GetName() + TString(".thePdf"), 
00110                           GetTitle() + TString(" thePdf"), 
00111                           *_gauss.getPdf(), 
00112                           *_argus.getPdf(),
00113                           *_fracGauss);
00114 
00115   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00116 }
00117 
00118 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00119 void BdkPdfGaussArgus::deleteFrac() {
00120   // Deletes pointers:
00121   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00122   if ( _fracGauss != 0 )   delete _fracGauss;
00123 }
00124 
00125 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00126 void BdkPdfGaussArgus::addComponents() {
00127   // Adds the wrappers to the composite's list:
00128   addComponent(_gauss);
00129   addComponent(_argus);
00130 }
00131 
00132 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00133 void BdkPdfGaussArgus::linkParameters(RooRealVar * mean,
00134                                       RooRealVar * sigma,
00135                                       RooRealVar * endPoint, 
00136                                       RooRealVar * exp,
00137                                       RooRealVar * fracB) {
00138   // Copies RRV pointers:
00139   _gauss.linkResolution(mean, sigma);
00140   _argus.linkParameters(endPoint, exp);
00141 
00142   if (0 != fracB) {
00143     _fracGauss = fracB;
00144     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00145   }
00146 }
